name: senditapi
description: Sendit api,this api will power up the front end to allow users create parcels orders cancel them,list specific ones also list them by the user that created them

scripts.build-test: npm run clean-test && cd build && mkdir test && babel .././test/test.js
scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdir build  && babel src/server.js db/parcels.js controllers/parcelsController.js -d build
scripts.build-routes: npm run clean-routes && cd build && mkdir routes && babel .././routes/route.js -d routes

author: Igwaneza Bruce
